summary: "Monty Python and the Holy Grail" is a hilarious 1975 British movie that makes fun of the legend of King Arthur and his search for the Holy Grail. The Monty Python comedy group wrote and starred in it. They came up with the idea while taking a break from their TV show. The movie was a big success and even inspired a musical called "Spamalot" years later. It's often considered one of the best comedy films ever made.
title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail
